document.title: Data from NSF Award #1155339: Governance of International Labor Migration: Scalar Politics and Network Relations
document.abstract: The deposited documents are created for a project funded by the National Science Foundation on the governance of international labor migration: politics of scale and networks (Award #1155339). The site contains transcripts of interviews with stakeholders in international skilled migration, a survey conducted with foreign-born engineers and information technology specialists in two petroleum-related companies and two information technology companies, survey codes, a project web site, research presentations, and a project-related publication.

field.name: comments
field.value:
Seven documents comprise this data collection:

  1. Fafo Project Report http://dx.doi.org/10.7290/V7SF2T3W
  2. van Riemsdijk Mic Nite Presentation: vanRiemsdijk_BattleForTheBrains-AttractingTheBestAndBrightestWorkers_2014-11-12.mp4 http://dx.doi.org/10.7290/V78G8HMV
  3. Interview Codes: vanRiemsdijk_GovernanceOfInternationalLaborMigrationPoliticsOfScaleAndNetworks_ProjectCodes_2014.txturvey Questions: vanRiemsdijk http://dx.doi.org/10.7290/V71Z429K
  4. SurveyQuestions_Oslo_2013.pdf http://dx.doi.org/10.7290/V7J1012V
  5. Alana Burnham Presentation http://dx.doi.org/10.7290/V7X63JT6
  6. Project Website||SkilledMigration.net: Migration - Innovation - Networks - Dynamics - Scale (MINDS) http://dx.doi.org/10.7290/V7NP22CJ
  7. van Riemsdijk Fafo Presentation http://dx.doi.org/10.7290/V7D798BK

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: van Riemsdijk, Micheline, "Data from NSF Award #1155339: Governance of International Labor Migration: Scalar Politics and Network Relations." (2015).
